name: SearchJobsByTitle
description:
Search for jobs by title.

Use this tool to find job listings by specifying the job title. This is useful for locating specific job openings across various industries and locations.

parameters.name: job_search_criteria
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the job title and optional requisition ID to search for.

title.description: The title of the job to search for

requisitionId.description: The requisition ID of the job to search for

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

title.description: The title of the job to search for

requisitionId.description: The requisition ID of the job to search for
